resources.string:
Hello.

I'm Rahul, mobile application developer.

This is an example application that shows how to use MVP with Dagger2 and Retrofit in Kotlin. It fetches data from typicode api (https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com)

Please check the source code for further information.

Thank you.

 Rahul
